Self.Wiki: This map object represents an message in the map.

MessageID.Wiki: The ID of the message's text in the FMGs.

Hidden.Wiki: Whether the message requires Seek Guidance to appear.

ItemLotParamID.Wiki: The item lot to use when this message is triggered.

MessageSfxID.Wiki: The particle ID to use for this message.

EnableEventFlagID.Wiki: This event flag must be ON for the message to appear.

CharacterModelName.Wiki: The model name of the character to render when the message is triggered.

NPCParamID.Wiki: The property parameters for the character that is rendered when the message is triggered.

AnimationID.Wiki: The animation ID to use for the character that is rendered when the message is triggered.

CharaInitParamID.Wiki: The ID in CharaInitParam determining equipment and stats for the character that is rendered when the message is triggered.
